index-news-1-text: Don't miss Saturday's Party with performance of famous singer from Portugal.

index-news-2-text: All workshop and parties will be held in "Turība" halls.

index-news-3-header: With all the richness of choice, the choice is one – Riga!

index-news-3-text: Those who were with us, have no doubt where to spend an unforgettable weekend. We are proud of your choice!
